S06n562:273: yaiśca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca,
S06n562:275: yaiśca tiryagyonigatairapi sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca,
S06n562:277: yaiśca sattvaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvṛteṣu parinirvāsyatsu parinirvāyatsu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
S06n562:279: tāni sarvāṇyakato'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodeta,
S06n562:280: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta |
S06n562:281: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta- anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti |
S06n562:282: tasya kathaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
S06n562:283: sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati-te dharmāḥ kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ,
S06n562:284: sa ca dharmo'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n562:287: evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati |
S06n562:289: tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate |
S06n562:299: yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tadapi viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n562:300: sacedevamapi na saṃjānīte-sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti,
S06n562:301: evamiyaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yadapi tatteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam |
S06n562:303: yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tadapi tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam |
S06n562:307: na hi buddhā bhagavanto nimittayogena pariṇāmanāmabhyanujānanti |
S06n562:311: yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ na viṣayaḥ |
S06n562:314: atha smṛtivaikalyena na nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā,
S06n562:318: evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n562:319: evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam-idaṃ tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam |
S06n562:322: atra copāyakauśalaṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā paripraśnīkartavyā |
S06n562:324: na hi prajñāpāramitāmanāgamya śakyeyamaśrutavatā prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmanākriyā praveṣṭum |
S06n562:325: tatra ya evaṃ vadet-śakyamanāgamya prajñāpāramitāṃ tatpuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumiti,
S06n562:331: api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgalo nimittīkṛtya vikalpya ca yathābhūtamayathābhūte yathābhūtasaṃjñī upalambhamanupalambhe pariṇāmayet,
S06n562:332: tasya kuśalamūlaṃ buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ pariṇāmitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau nābhyanujānanti |
S06n562:334: eṣa eva hi tasya mahānupalambho bhavati,
S06n562:335: yatsa parinirvāṇamapi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca |
S06n562:337: na copalambhasaṃjñinastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmanāṃ mahārthakarīṃ vadanti |
S06n562:340: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ saviṣaṃ bhavet,
S06n562:341: kiṃ cāpi tadvarṇataśca gandhataśca rasataśca sparśataśca abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
S06n562:342: api tu khalu punaḥ saviṣatvātparivarjanīyaṃ bhavati paṇḍitānām,
S06n562:344: tadeva bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta |
S06n562:345: tasya tadbhojanaṃ paribhuñjānasya varṇatasya gandhataśca rasataśca sparśataśca svādeṣu sukhakaraṃ pariṇāme cāsya duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati |
S06n562:348: evameva ārya subhūte ihaike durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena subhāṣitasyārthamajānānā yathābhūtamarthamanavabudhyamānā evamavavadiṣyanti,
S06n562:349: evamanuśāsiṣyanti-ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham |
S06n562:350: teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ yaistatra teṣvatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
S06n562:351: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
S06n562:352: etasminnantare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānām,
S06n562:353: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca,
S06n562:354: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
S06n562:355: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
S06n562:356: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
S06n562:357: ye ca śrāvakayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca śrāvakabodhau,
S06n562:358: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante'varopyante ca,
S06n562:359: yāni ca pṛthagjanānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamekato'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati |
S06n562:360: evaṃ sa pariṇāmo nimittayogena pariṇāmyamāno viṣatvāya saṃpravartate,
S06n562:370: kathaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n562:371: ihānena bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatamanabhyākhyātukāmena evaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanumoditavyamevaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā buddhajñānena buddhacakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇam |
S06n562:372: yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate tathā anumode tatkuśalamūlam,
S06n562:373: yathā ca te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhyanujānanti pariṇāmyamānaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06n562:375: evamanumodamāna evaṃ pariṇāmayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'naparāddho bhavati |
S06n562:376: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaktvānumoditaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ ca bhavati tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
S06n562:378: evaṃ cāsya pariṇāmo nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati adhyāśayena adhimuktyā pariṇāmayataḥ ||
S06n562:379: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam-yacchīlaṃ yaḥ samādhiryā prajñā yā vimuktiryadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tadyathā aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātau aparyāpannaṃ rūpadhātau aparyāpannamārūīpyadhātau nāpyatītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam |
S06n562:386: evaṃ pariṇāmayatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmo bhavatyaparyāpanno nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati |
S06n562:390: anayā dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti,
S06n562:391: yathā cābhyanujānanti tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitamevaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti,
S06n562:393: evaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ||
S06n562:394: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu subhūte |
S06n562:400: asyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti paśyanti,
S06n562:401: tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate,
S06n562:405: atra yaḥ puṇyaskandho yaśca gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
S06n562:406: tān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayetpratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06n562:408: tato'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajaḥ puṇyaskandho'gra ākhyāyate,
S06n562:419: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06n562:420: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06n562:421: te sarve caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ,
S06n562:423: tato'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanāsahagataḥ puṇyaskandho'gra ākhyāyate,
S06n562:434: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ caturdhyānaniṣpādanasaṃbhūtaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06n562:435: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06n562:437: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturapramāṇalābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06n562:438: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06n562:440: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturārūpyasamāpattilābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06n562:441: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06n562:443: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu pañcābhijñānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06n562:444: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu srotaāpannā bhaveyuḥ |
S06n562:445: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06n562:446: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06n562:448: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06n562:449: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06n562:451: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmanāgāmināṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06n562:452: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ te sarve arhanto bhaveyuḥ |
S06n562:453: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmarhatāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ,
S06n562:454: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06n562:456: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ,
S06n562:457: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06n562:458: te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ |
S06n562:459: ye sarve anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
S06n562:463: etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃśca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānupatiṣṭheccīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ,
S06n562:465: evamekaikasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanena paryāyeṇa dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n562:467: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
S06n562:472: saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum,
S06n562:473: gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyamapi upanisāpi upaniṣadapi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum |
S06n562:475: sa puṇyaskandho gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣvapi trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu na māyet ||
S06n562:477: yatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto'nena dharmadhātupariṇāmena tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06n562:479: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajasya asau pūrvaka upalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06n562:480: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06n562:481: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi aupamyamapi upanisāmapi upaniṣadamapi na kṣamate |
S06n562:483: tathā hi teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ subahvapi dānaṃ dattaṃ subahvityapi parisaṃkhyātaṃ bhavati ||
S06n562:484: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi prāñjalīni namasyanti bhagavantametadavocan-mahāpariṇāmo'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ kuśalamūlapariṇāmaḥ sarvajñatāyai,
S06n562:485: yatra hi nāma teṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvantaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhibhavati |
S06n562:486: atha khalu trāyastriṃśakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇavarṣairdivyai ratnavarṣairdivyaiśca vastravarṣairbhagavantamabhyavākirannabhiprākiran |
S06n562:487: divyaiśchatrairdivyairdhvajairdivyābhirghaṇṭābhirdivyābhiḥ patākābhiḥ samantācca divyadīpamālābhirbahuvidhābhiśca divyābhiḥ pūjābhirbhagavantaṃ satkurvanti sma,
S06n562:488: gurukurvanti sma mānayanti sma pūjayanti sma arcayanti sma apacāyanti sma,
S06n562:490: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta-mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo'yaṃ dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ,
S06n562:491: yatra hi nāma tatteṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraskandhamabhibhavati yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītatvādasya mahāpariṇāmasya |
S06n562:492: evamanyebhyo'pi devanikāyebhyo devaputrā āgatya bhagavantaṃ parameṇa satkāreṇa parameṇa gurukāreṇa paramayā mānanayā paramayā pūjanayā paramayā arcanayā paramayā apacāyanayā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā arcayitvā apacāyya evameva śabdamudīrayanti sma,

S06n562:599: ye'pi te subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,

S06n562:602: yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannān kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārān sarvānekato'bhisaṃkṣipya pīṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā |
S06n562:603: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate |
S06n562:604: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyatriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati |
S06n562:605: asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno'sau paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06n562:606: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06n562:607: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi aupamyamapi upanisāmapi upaniṣadamapi na kṣamate |
S06n562:609: tathā hi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñino dhyānāni samāpadyante iti ||
